ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: Must be in the room where the dwarf, wood elf, and other two gnomes show up. Do you know if they were able to talk to Bidl to get the lens or had to kill him
ygData.messageBody:
Must be in the room where the dwarf, wood elf, and other two gnomes show up.
Do you know if they were able to talk to Bidl to get the lens or had to
kill him or something.
What about the other observatories? Any information on those?

At 01:24 PM 07/23/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: AOLTechDaZ@...
>
>In a message dated 99-07-23 13:21:40 EDT, you write:
>
><< This is news to me. Well, I will have to keep camping it when I get back
> on the game Sunday.
> Well, can you tell me where Bidl spawns and how to get the other two lenses
> from the observatories? >>
>
>
>I have never went back there. But from the conversations they have it it
>is somewhere very close to meldrith. When I go invisible back there he can
>see me and kills me so I never go back there.
>
